Name: Happy Guy
About the game: TRADING CARDS Happy Guy is a casual game with a short story about Haro - an IT helpdesk in a hospital. CHARACTERS Ren Nanase is a sexy and beautiful nurse. She was the reason why Haro left his job. Rei is a maid. She is so cute and obedient. She works at Haro's own house, when he was rich. Akari is a waitress. She is so energetic. She has a dream of opening her own bakery. Akari is the girl who stays with Haro during the worst days of his life. Narumi is a rich and arrogant girl. She owns a men's fashion store. Haro used to look down on Haro until ... FEATURES - Casual and attractive mahjong mixed match 3 style. - Nice backgrounds and character CGs. - Chill BGM. - Full Japanese voice over. VOICE ACTRESS - 椎名透子. - Ah-ya
